dpInst.dpinstTitle: Cypress PSoC tools USB driver Installer
dpInst.welcomeTitle: Welcome to the Cypress PSoC Tools USB driverInstaller!
dpInst.welcomeIntro: This wizard will walk you through updating the drivers for your PSoC USB driver.
dpInst.installHeaderTitle: Installing the software for your PSoC tool USB driver...
dpInst.finishTitle: Congratulations! You are finished installing your PSoC tool USB driver.
dpInst.finishText: PSoC tools USB driver is ready for use.
